pages.title: Fire Aspect
pages.text: Giving the soldiers a Blaze Rod will make it so when they attack something, it will be set on fire. Occupies the Main hand slot of the soldier.

pages.title: Shield
pages.text: Gives a shield to the soldier. Occupies the Secondary hand slot of the soldier.

pages.title: Heaviness
pages.text: Makes the soldier heavier (so falls quicker and  walks slower), while giving it more health. Applies as an infinite effect - Takes no slot

pages.title: Clay Healer
pages.text: The soldier will heal itself or others while having a clay ball item. Each item heals 2 hp. Occupies Secondary hand. Consumes the item upon usage

pages.title: Slow Falling
pages.text: Applies Slow falling effect infinitely - Takes no slot

pages.title: Suspicious Effects
pages.text: Applies an effect for 5 seconds based on the flower type you dropped. These flower types are applying the same effect as they would give when crafted into a suspicious stew. The flower item is consumed.
